name: Bonky's World
description:
Hello, Welcome to Bonky's world. 

It has three levels of bonkstacles.

Play on fullscreen and there is no pause button, sorry.

Have fun finishing the levels to see the end screen.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Sprint

LMB - Slap

RMB - Rocket Spam

This is a project from our subject Game Design 1 around Summer of 2022.
